data.name: Syrian Warfare Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Syrian Warfare Original Soundtrack. After downloading it, you can find the soundtrack in your Steam directory (...Steam/steamapps/common/Syrian Warfare/OST) or in the Steam Music Player.

Playlist:
01 - EDLISE - Sense of trouble [4:16]
02 - EDLISE - Arrive [5:09]
03 - EDLISE - Concentration [5:30]
04 - EDLISE - Warbeat [5:02]
05 - EDLISE - Method War [3:49]
06 - EDLISE - No choice way [4:05]
07 - EDLISE - Guntrack [4:33]
08 - EDLISE - Battle pulse [5:44]
09 - Smileque - Sands [3:21]
10 - Brook Vernade - Death valley [4:08]
11 - Brook Vernade - Homeland [4:19]
12 - Brook Vernade - Machine squad leader [3:42]
13 - Brook Vernade - Operation overcast [2:35]
14 - Brook Vernade - The great deliverance [3:36]
15 - Brook Vernade - There way ahead [4:32]
16 - Brook Vernade - We are not alone [4:05]
17 - EDLISE - Lovely Syria [4:45]
18 - EDLISE - Etudes of war [3:44]
19 - (BONUS) Artyom Grishanov - Dying but not surrendering (Vocal version) [4:24]
20 - (BONUS) Artyom Grishanov - Russian Storm (Vocal version) [4:26]

Total time: 1h 25m 44s

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: XP or higher
  • Processor: 1Ghz or higher
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel graphics or higher
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: +
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: XP or higher
  • Processor: 1Ghz or higher
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel graphics or higher
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: +
